name: Arcana Force XX - The Judgment
text:
1 Tuner monster + 1 non-Tuner "Arcana Force" monster.
When this card is Summoned, flip a coin:
Heads - Negate the effects of all monsters your opponent currently controls. This card cannot attack. If an "Arcana Force" monster you control battles an opponent’s monster: It gains ATK equal to its DEF until the end of the Damage Step.
Tails - All monsters your opponent currently controls have their ATK become 0. Other monsters you control cannot attack. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.
